legal_basis: Visa officers must provide applicants a meaningful opportunity to respond to allegations and base decisions on credible evidence
procedural_fairness: Applicant confronted with allegations during second interview without prior notice but had chance to respond
credibility_findings: Contradictions in military booklet explanation, evasive answers regarding occupation
decision_reasoning: Visa officer did not breach fairness duties nor made an unreasonable credibility determination
result_of_case: Application for judicial review dismissed; no question certified
